member.summary: Get information about all BLOBs for a specific test (DUT id + type + count)

member.name: M:Idefix.PamelaNet.ITestResultStore3.GetAllCriterias(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: For given criteria document number and (optional) revision, get a list with criteria combinations. This function can be used to check if the combination of criteria document number and revision already exists in TestNet, to avoid creating criteria with same revision with different date that will be rejected by TestNet.

member.name: M:Idefix.PamelaNet.ITestResultStore3.GetAllLayouts(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: For given layout document number and (optional) revision, get a list with layout combinations. This function can be used to check if the combination of layout document number and revision already exists in TestNet, to avoid creating layout with same revision with different date that will be rejected by TestNet.

member.summary: Calculate and fetch CPK information that can be used for sample based testing.
member.param: The algorithm to use for calculating CPK info.
The maximum number of returned values.
The measurement point names to use in calculation.
Set to true to force a new calculation.

member.name: T:Idefix.PamelaNet.RecordInfoItem
member.summary: Test record information such as serial number, product number, operator name and pass/fail status.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: The criteria file format. Currently the only allowed value is "STD".

member.summary: The area in which the test station is located.

member.name: P:Idefix.PamelaNet.RecordInfoItem.Line
member.summary: The production line that the test station belongs to.

member.name: P:Idefix.PamelaNet.RecordInfoItem.SerialNumber
member.summary: The serial number of the DUT.

member.name: P:Idefix.PamelaNet.RecordInfoItem.Station
member.summary: The name of the test station.

member.name: P:Idefix.PamelaNet.RecordInfoItem.User
member.summary: The signum of the operator running the test station.

member.summary: Information about the product being tested.

member.name: P:Idefix.PamelaNet.RecordInfoItem.Status
member.summary: The pass/fail status of the DUT.

member.name: F:Idefix.PamelaNet.RecordInfoItem.FirstFailed
member.summary: Information about the first failed measurement point (if any).

member.name: F:Idefix.PamelaNet.RecordInfoItem.Testplan
member.summary: Information about the testplan file, such as document number and revision.

member.name: F:Idefix.PamelaNet.RecordInfoItem.Criteria
member.summary: Information about the criteria file, such as document number and revision.

member.name: F:Idefix.PamelaNet.RecordInfoItem.Layout
member.summary: Information about the layout file, such as document number and revision. Optional.

member.name: F:Idefix.PamelaNet.RecordInfoItem.TestInstruction
member.summary: Information about the test instruction file, such as document number and revision. Optional.

member.name: P:Idefix.PamelaNet.RecordInfoItem.RunMode
member.summary: The mode the test was executed in. AUTO, MANUAL or CUSTOM.

member.name: P:Idefix.PamelaNet.RecordInfoItem.Mark
member.summary: A special card mark provided by the operator. Can be used to signal that the DUT is part of a special batch. Optional.

member.name: P:Idefix.PamelaNet.RecordInfoItem.StartTime
member.summary: The start time of the test run.

member.name: P:Idefix.PamelaNet.RecordInfoItem.StopTime
member.summary: The stop time of the test run.

member.name: P:Idefix.PamelaNet.RecordInfoItem.ConfigurationKey
member.summary: The configuration key used during testing. The configuration key is used to provide additional configuration details such as which firmware version to use. Optional.

member.name: P:Idefix.PamelaNet.RecordInfoItem.ProcessStep
member.summary: The test category of the test. This is known in Bartrack as the "Process Step".

member.summary: Value indicating whether dynamic testing was used or not.
member.value: true if dynamic testing was used; otherwise, false

member.name: P:Idefix.PamelaNet.RecordInfoItem.Comment
member.summary: A comment for the test, provided by the test program.

member.name: M:Idefix.PamelaNet.TestRecordItem.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Idefix.PamelaNet.TestRecordItem.CriteriaFilePath
member.summary: The full path to the criteria file. This parameter is optional but always provided by Idefix.
member.remarks: If a call to Pamela.NET is made through the StoreEx function in PamelaNetBridge (which is what Idefix does) then the file is parsed and the rest of the object is populated before a call is made into the ITestResultStore driver(s).

member.name: P:Idefix.PamelaNet.TestRecordItem.LayoutFilePath
member.summary: The full path to the layout file. This parameter is optional.

member.name: P:Idefix.PamelaNet.TestRecordItem.RecordFilePath
member.summary: The full path to the record file. This parameter is optional but always provided by Idefix.
member.remarks: If a call to Pamela.NET is made through the StoreEx function in PamelaNetBridge (which is what Idefix does) then the file is parsed and the rest of the object is populated before a call is made into the ITestResultStore driver(s).

member.name: P:Idefix.PamelaNet.TestRecordItem.TestplanFilePath
member.summary: The full path to the testplan file. This parameter is optional and NOT provided by Idefix.

member.name: F:Idefix.PamelaNet.TestRecordItem.Info
member.summary: Test record information such as serial number, product number, operator name and pass/fail status.

member.summary: List of all measurement point groups contained in the criteria file.

member.summary: List of all circumstances generated during the test.
